text: Sandra Ortega Mera (born 19 July 1968) is a Spanish billionaire heiress. ==Early life== Sandra Ortega Mera is the daughter of Amancio Ortega Gaona, founder of Inditex and one of the wealthiest people in the world, and his first wife, Rosalía Mera. Ortega earned a degree in psychology from the University of Santiago de Compostela. ==Career== On her mother Rosalía Mera's death in 2013, Ortega inherited her 7% stake in Inditex, as her brother Marcos was born with cerebral palsy, and became Spain's richest woman with a net worth of $7.3 billion. Ortega spends time working with the foundation her mother founded for those with mental and physical disabilities, Fundación Paideia Galiza. ==Personal life== Ortega is married with three children and lives in A Coruña, Spain. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Female billionaires Category:Spanish billionaires Category:People from A Coruña Category:Spanish women in business Category:University of Santiago de Compostela alumni Category:Galician businesspeople
